english.segment1: strong and mighty. strong to save us. like a fortress. never failing
english.segment2: strong in battle. strong in kindness. when we stray, Lord. You're strong to find us
english.segment3: when the winds come hard against us. You are steadfast, You are true. when the ground beneath us trembles. Your foundation never moves
english.segment4: Chorus: strong tower. high and glorious. strong tower. mighty in love. our refuge. our defender. strong tower. Lord above
english.segment5: strong to lead us. through the shadows. strong to carry. all our sorrows
english.segment6: when the enemy surrounds us. closing in as darkness falls. though his armies rage against us. they can never scale these walls
english.segment8: Bridge: You are my shelter, my shield. You are the home I could never deserve. here I will serve, ever under Your gaze. here I will serve, ever singing Your praise
english.segment10: strong tower. Lord above. strong tower. Lord above.
